summary.para: Gets the current color glyph run.

param.name: colorGlyphRun
param.para: Receives a pointer to the color glyph run. The pointer remains valid until the next call to MoveNext or until the interface is released.

returns.para: Standard HRESULT error code. An error is returned if there is no current glyph run, i.e., if MoveNext has not yet been called or if the end of the sequence has been reached.

summary.para: Enumerator for an ordered collection of color glyph runs.
